QuestData.Title: Just You and Mathias
QuestData.Description: The SI:7 are all dead. Time to find Master Mathias Shaw.$B$BGood thing the squad commander told you where he would be.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Master Mathias Shaw at the Twilight Citadel in the Twilight Highlands.
QuestData.RewardText: Where are the rest of my people?
